modName: Hired Thugs Fixed (or No Hired Thugs optional)
summary: sets it so hired thugs are sent after you for a stolen item ONLY IF YOU ARE CAUGHT STEALING
descriptionHtml:
I have seen many requests for this

sets it so hired thugs are only sent after you for a stolen item[b] IF YOU ARE SEEN STEALING[/b]
forwards USKP & USLEEP 3.0.1 fixes but neither are required (though highly recommended)
make sure it is enabled below USKP/USLEEP

optional file totally disables hired thugs

both files included in zip, you only need 1

made in TESVEdit, no resources or scripts used so it is 100% safe to merge

future updates(?): add variability to the thugs, optional file that reduces time until thugs can come after you again, other suggestions made by users

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3381541/?tb=mods&pUp=1]
Check out my other mods![/url]
author: RJinthematrix

files.name: hired thug fixes includes both esps
